label: Shell Path
comments: Path of shell, $SHELL or PowerShell (on Windows) by default

label: Shell Args
comments: Arguments of shell command line

label: Shell Args
comments: Arguments of shell command line (for Windows)

label: Extra Environment Variables
comments: Extra environment variables

label: Extra Profiles
comments: Customize terminal profile
Could override the default 'shell', 'args' and 'env'

label: Enable Shell Integration
comments: Allow the terminal to inject scripts into the shell for enhanced functionality

label: Highlight Command Errors
comments: Highlight commands that were executed with errors
Requires Shell Integration to be enabled

label: Auto Trigger Completion
comments: Trigger intelligent completion automatically when inputing
Requires Shell Integration to be enabled

label: Enable Sticky Scroll
comments: Display the current command at the top of the terminal
Requires Shell Integration to be enabled

label: Open External Path In
comments: Specify how to open external paths
Options: 'new-tab' or 'new-window'

label: External Explorer
comments: Command for starting external file manager (or code editor, etc)
Use ${directory} to interpolate the variable at runtime
Open in system file manager by default

label: Remote External Explorer
comments: Command for starting remote external file manager
Use ${directory} or ${remote} to interpolate these variables at runtime
Skip by default

label: Enable Live CWD
comments: Support dynamic \w and \W in formatting
Disabling this feature will slightly improved performance
This will be automatically disabled when shell integration is enabled

label: Enable Live Icon
comments: Support real-time icon (currently for macOS only)
Disabling this feature will slightly improved performance

label: Enable Live Preview
comments: Preview latest output in list
It will not work if the tab list is at the top or bottom

label: Tab Title Format
comments: Title format of terminal tab in grammer of bash prompt
It will not work if title is set from OSC 0 or OSC 2
Supported identifiers: \h \H \l \s \u \w \W

label: Link Modifier
comments: Keyboard modifier for opening link by click

label: Renderer Type
comments: Specify how to render the terminal
Options: 'dom', 'canvas' or 'webgl'
'webgl' has the best performance but may have display flaws

label: Frame Type
comments: Frame type of window
Options: 'system', 'system-with-menu' or 'immersive'
Changing this setting will take effect after reloading the app

label: Tab List Position
comments: Position of terminal tab list

label: Background Opacity
comments: Background opacity of window
It will not work if RGBA background is specified in theme file
Or when using the system frame

label: Vibrancy Effect
comments: Specify whether or not to enable the vibrancy effect for window (currently for macOS only)
It will not work if the opacity of the window is not 1

label: Font Size
comments: Font size for window in pixels

label: Line Height
comments: Lint height for window
Will be treated as pixels if greater than 8
otherwise calculated relative to terminal.style.fontSize

label: Font Family
comments: Font family names for window
default: Fira Code, Consolas, Monaco, Andale Mono, Ubuntu Mono

label: Enable Font Ligatures
comments: Enable font ligatures (if specified font family supports, like Fira Code or Iosevka)

label: Cursor Style
comments: Cursor style for terminals

label: Theme Type
comments: Choose to use a dark or light theme
Or use 'system' to follow the system's dark mode

label: Dark Theme Name
comments: File name of built-in theme or files in `themes/` folder

label: Light Theme Name
comments: File name of built-in theme or files in `themes/` folder

label: Custom Dark Theme Colors
comments: Overwrite colors in the dark theme file

label: Custom Light Theme Colors
comments: Overwrite colors in the light theme file

label: Enabled Addons
comments: List of enabled addon name
